snippet: The Mets announced that pitcher Matt Harvey would have Tommy John surgery on his pitching elbow, ending his attempts to avoid it.
abstract: New York Mets announce that pitcher Matt Harvey will undergo Tommy John surgery on his pitching elbow, ending his attempts to avoid it.
lead_paragraph: The Mets announced that pitcher Matt Harvey would have Tommy John surgery on his pitching elbow, ending his attempts to avoid it.

headline.main: After Hoping to Avoid It, Harvey Will Have Surgery
headline.print_headline: After Hoping to Avoid It, Harvey Will Have Surgery
